welcome_slide_1.content: Schools app afford you the contentment of mind, following up your children trip to and their schools.

welcome_slide_2.content: At anytime your parent can know the status of child like (in bus / out of bus) and monitor the trip status and get alerted about the arrival time of bus for pickup and delivery of child

welcome_slide_3.content: At any time you can call the bus driver & supervisor, see your child's status and get alerted about the bus arrival time.

hints.reset_password_method_select: Select one the following method to receive your password.
hints.absence_delete_confimation: Are your sure you want to delete plan?
hints.confirm_set_student_absent: By confirmig this you will assign your child as absent from this trip today
hints.you_dont_have_absence_plan: You dont' have any absence plans

dialog.about: Parents, teachers, and school authorities can get relaxed about student safety during their trip inside the school bus either going to school or returning to their homes. Our smart Move Parent apps can help you get real-time updates about the children and school bus by monitoring the daily bus trips of your children and getting notified via push notifications. The app will keep you alerted when the bus is on the way to pick up your children, when the bus arrives to the pickup location and waiting for student onboarding and when the bus arrives to the school and your children get out of the bus. Moreover,  you can notify the school authorities of any absent plans for your child through the app and call the driver and supervisor of the bus.

snack-bar.please_check_user_name_password: please check user name or password!!
